member.name: SCHANNEL_ALG
member.summary: The SCHANNEL_ALG structure contains algorithm and key size information. It is used as the structure passed as pbData in when dwParam is set to KP_SCHANNEL_ALG.

summary.para: Indicates the use of derived keys. The following values can be used.

listheader.description: Derive keys to create or verify SSL MAC signatures.
Derive keys to encrypt or decrypt data.

summary.para: Algorithms used with the derived keys. Note that no algorithm will be specified unless earlier obtained from the CSP by enumeration.
SCHANNEL_MAC_KEYs can be either MD5 or SHA.
SCHANNEL_ENC_KEYs can be RC4, DES, 3DES, or RC2.

member.name: SCHANNEL_ALG.cBits
member.summary: Size in bits of the derived keys.

member.name: SCHANNEL_ALG.dwFlags
member.summary: This flag can be set to INTERNATIONAL_USAGE (0x00000001), indicating that derived keys must follow SSL export rules.

member.name: SCHANNEL_ALG.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved for future use. Should be set to zero.
